features: 【Silverware Set for 8】This forks and spoons silverware set includes 8 of each: Dinner Knives, Dinner Forks, Dinner Spoons, Salad/Dessert Forks and Dessert/Tea Spoons, well packed in a gift cardboard box. It’s the ideal flatware set for home daily use, and also for restaurants, pubs, cafes, and hotels. This cutlery set also helps your dinner be full of design while having a party.

【Matte Silverware Set】Unique design, elegant silver matte look, different from the conspicuous mirror finish or black tableware, our matte flatware set for 8 exudes an understated aura of elegance, and will not easily leave fingerprints on them. Unique but modern flatware blends with many dinnerware, Elevate the dining experience with decent silverware sets.

【Healthy and Premium Stainless Steel Flatware】This kitchen utensils set is made of high quality food grade stainless steel which is very health, safety, durable,rust-proof, corrosion resistant, BPA free, nickel-free and no metal aftertaste. Meanwhile, its sturdiness ensures that it will not bend easily providing you with long-term use. Easy clean and DISHWASHER SAFE.

【Comfortable Heft & Excellent Workmanship】This spoons and forks set has a moderate size and weight, providing you well balanced and great hand feels. Extra careful polishing of all the edges without rough spots, ensure the safety of your lips.

【Multiple Uses】Choosing a good set of cutlery is not only for everyday use, but also for upcoming holiday parties, gatherings, family dinners, candlelight dinners, banquets, weddings and other formal occasions. It's also a decent gift for family and friends. And If you have any questions, please click seller's nickname then click "Ask a question" to contact us. EIUBUIE offers 6 months of warranty service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EIUBUIE 40 Piece Unique Matte Finish Silverware Set 40 Piece matte cutlery set is our top pick because of its food grade high quality material, stylish design, matte finish and ergonomic handles that make each piece a pleasure to hold. Whether your style is traditional or modern, this flatware will complement your decor.

Proper Weight and Size, Great Quality The utensil set has the right weight and length and provides a good grasp for both adults and older children. Suitable for most families, and meets dining needs. Made of high quality stainless steel without any harmful substances ensuring healthy safety, durability for serving you for many years.

Matte Silverware This stainless forks silverware features a satin polish that can prevent scratches and provides long-lasting performance and requires no re-polishing Unique But No Flashy Design Unique handle design with a sense of design but not flashy, but no complicated decoration, the whole flatware set exudes a beautiful luster Exquisite Workmanship Multiple times of fine polishing ensure this forks spoons and knives set are smooth, with no sharp edges, so that they are comfortable to hold and use Dishwasher Safe This stainless steel silverware set is dishwasher safe, even after numerous uses and washing, this modern silverware set will not require re-polishing

EIUBUIE cutlery sets always adhere to the best materials and craftsmanship combined to provide you with unlimited possibilities from daily meals to the most special occasions and a perfect dining experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and elegant
reviews.reviewText: Design wise, these are basic, but I think that adds to the elegance. They’ve got good weight to them and they appear to be sturdy and quality built. They’re shipped in a very basic box and just wrapped in a paper material so if you’re gifting these I’d recommend a nice flatware box or something along those lines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this look. They are really good quality and wash great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like the look and feel, great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: We like this set a lot. We did find though that we needed more small spoons and small forks. Contacted customer service and they were able to set up a link for us to order more. You do have to pay shipping because they’re coming from China but for us, it was well worth it. The large spoon is rather large, as is the large fork, and for every day use really like the smaller knives and forks. Customer service was very responsive and immediately sent us over a link to order the quantity that we had requested.Recommend the seller and this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A decent silverware setting
reviews.reviewText: If you have any rusty or not up to par silverware in your home, it may be time for a replacement set. This silverware here came wrapped assorted but together. So far everything appears to be alright. They aren't rusting or anything like that. An they are inexpensive so if you're in need of some silverware this could very well be your solution.
